import { type FC } from 'react' import ReactDOM from 'react-dom' export interface ModalProps { onClose: () => void; onActionBtnClick: () => void; onSubmit: (text: string) => void; // New prop for handling form submission cardId: string | null; } const Modal: FC = ({ cardId, onClose, onActionBtnClick, onSubmit }) => { const handleSubmit = (e: React.FormEvent) => { e.preventDefault() const formData = new FormData(e.target as HTMLFormElement) const text = formData.get('text') as string onSubmit(text) onClose() } return ReactDOM.createPortal(

Card Information

Card ID:

{cardId}

{/* Add other card information here */}
{/* Add form for submitting text */}
, document.getElementById('modal-root')! ) } export default Modal
